name: 張致遠
objective:
這課程介紹人造衛星的種類及應用，人造衛星系統及次系統基礎知識，並進行衛星概念設計，以培養具有從事衛星任務設計之基礎能力。
This course will introduce the types, applications, systems and subsystems of the satellites. The class project is to perform the conceptual design of the satellite.  The course objective is to cultivate the students to own the basic capability to perform the satellite mission design.
